item.title: Anna add a quote by Andrew Shaffer
item.description:
"I like my tea like I like my men,” I say. With the last name “Grey.” But I realize that’s too forward, so I add, “Black.”
He raises an eyebrow.
“I mean, not that I exclusively like black men,” I say, trying to recover. “I like other kinds of tea. And men.”
“Have you ever tasted...white tea, Anna?" -- Andrew Shaffer

item.title: Anna add a quote by Andrew Shaffer
item.description: "<i>Stop it, girl. There’s no way he’s five-years-old. Or one hundred. He’s probably like every other CEO on the planet: Late twenties, handsome in that geeky sort of way, and just as awkward as you. </i>I breathe a sigh of relief, because I know I’m probably right." -- Andrew Shaffer

item.title: Anna add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "He - and if there is a God, I am convinced he is a he, because no woman could or would ever fuck things up this badly." -- George Carlin
